mean_cn: n. 自由作家，自由记者；  adj. 自由投稿的
mean_en: earning money by being hired to work on different jobs for short periods of time rather than by having a permanent job with one employer
word_etyma: freel=free自由 + ance 表名词，状态、情况、性质、行为 → n. 自由作家；自由记者
short_phrase: The freelance worker works by the sea.
sentence: I'm a freelance worker, so I'm basically my own boss.
sentence_trans: 我是个自由作家，所以我基本上算是我自己的老板。
